meanings.definition: A group or association, especially in India.
meanings.sent1: The sangh gathered to discuss community issues.
meanings.sent2: The local sangh organized a charity event for the village.
meanings.sent3: The sangh meeting turned into a lively debate about the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent4: The sangh of artists painted a beautiful mural together.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the sangh helped him feel connected to his roots.

meanings.definition: To sing in a group, especially in a religious context.
meanings.sent1: They sangh hymns together during the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The choir sangh beautifully at the church service.
meanings.sent3: The birds outside seemed to sangh along with the choir.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the waves sangh a soothing lullaby to the beachgoers.
meanings.sent5: Her voice sangh out above the rest, filling the room with joy.
